summary: A news-reel like movie about early part of the French Revolution, shown from the eyes of individual people, citizens of Marseille, counts in German exile and, of course the king Louis XVI, ... See full summary »
cast: Pierre Renoir|Lise Delamare|Léon Larive|William Aguet|Elisa Ruis|Marie-Pierre Sordet-Dantès|Yveline Auriol|Pamela Stirling|Génia Vaury|Louis Jouvet|Jean Aquistapace|Georges Spanelly|Jaque Catelain|Pierre Nay|Edmond Castel|Werner Florian|Aimé Clariond|Maurice Escande|André Zibral|Jean Aymé|Irène Joachim|Andrex|Edmond Ardisson|Charles Blavette|Paul Dullac|Jean-Louis Allibert|Fernand Flament|Alex Truchy|Georges Péclet|Géo Dorlis|Géo Lastry|Adolphe Autran|Édouard Delmont|Nadia Sibirskaïa|Jenny Hélia|Gaston Modot|Sévérine Lerczinska|Julien Carette|Marthe Marty|Odette Cazau|Edmond Beauchamp|Blanche Destournelles|Pierre Ferval|Fernand Bellan|Jean Boissemond|Lucy Kieffer|Raymond Pélissier|Jacques Castelot|Roger Prégor|Robert Manuel|Robert Rollis
title: La Marsellesa
